1252.content:
Tom is an 18 year old boy who has recently finished school but is currently unemployed and lives at home with his parents. Tom was never a high performer at school and is little more than a lazy layabout with little going in terms of ambition and is quite happy to not get a job and laze around the house all day.

Tom also has a little sister, Amy. Amy is a little angel of a two year old who Tom's parents absolutely adore, and for some reason she's been making Tom feel a little jealous of the attention she's been getting recently.

Tom is currently lazing around at home, looking after Amy while their parents are out at work.

12521.content:
Tom was watching TV when he realised he really needed to pee, so he got up and headed to to the toilet.
Along the way he passed Amy's room, deciding that he should probably check on her he quietly tip-toed into her room and peered into her crib.
Amy was sleeping soundly, as always. She was such a good kid... and despite it making babysitting easier, Tom kind of hated that. No matter what he seemed to do he never really lived up to his parent's expectations of him, and unfortunately for him he was far too lazy to do much about it.

"Urgh... You always get all the attention" He whispered to her, "you don't have to worry about getting a job or anything like that either, sometimes I wish I could be like you..."
12521.title: Check on Amy

125211.content:
Turning to leave, Tom noticed the opened pack of pullups on Amy's changing table. Maybe it was his current thought pattern, but he felt compelled to reach out and take one.
Tom took the pink plastic item out of its packaging, opening it up to reveal Disney princesses across the crotch. he wasn't even really sure what he was doing but he decided to go with it and escaped to his room.

"What am I doing?" Tom said, closing the door behind him. He brought the pullup to his nose and sniffed, the smell bringing back memories of his childhood. He sighed, "it'd be pretty nice to be a kid again. No worries or responsibilities... and all the attention I can get"
125211.title: He notices Amy's pullups

1252111.content:
After thinking for a second he decided to follow his strange thought pattern and try the pullup on.

Tom took off his trousers and underwear and picked up the pullup again, then slid it up his legs. It was a little tight, but Tom was pretty skinny and managed to get all the way up to his waist.
Tom ran his hands over the childish and girly underwear and smiled. He may not really be a baby, but wearing something made for one filled him with excitement and made him feel a little like one at least.

Wanting to see what he looked like he left his room and went to find a mirror.
1252111.title: He puts the pullup on

choices: He goes and has a nap
12521111.content:
Tom made his way to the bathroom to look at himself in the mirror. He looked at himself and felt a little foolish, but looking down on the bathroom counter he found one of Amy's discarded pacifiers. He picked it up and plopped in in his mouth, giving it a little suck.

He looked at himself again and blushed, he felt so silly... but at the same time, wearing his sisters pullup and sucking on her pacifier, he imagined himself as her, getting all the love that he used to get, and he liked that feeling.
12521111.title: He goes to the bathroom

125211111.content:
Yawning, Tom returned to the living room. Despite the excitement in his chest he was pretty sleepy, staying up late playing video games might have something to do with that. That was when he noticed Amy's playpen in the middle of the room ( https://amp.businessinsider.com/images/5...)

"Am I going too far with this?" he said quietly to himself, the words a little muffled through 'his' pacifier. He took a deep breath and decided to climb in to the playpen, at this stage just wanting to push his baby experience just a bit further...

He curled up in the playpen, holding a stuffed bear that he'd found in there to his chest and drifted off...
125211111.title: He goes and has a nap

1252111111.content:
Several hours later Tom awoke to a bang. Groggily he looked around himself, a little confused at his surroundings "wait...am I in a crib?" he said to himself, words muffled by the pacifier in his mouth.
Slowly everything came back to him as he realised that his crotch was cold and soggy. Tom groaned, realising that he'd wet himself. Suddenly, he snapped his head up, eyes darting to the hallway as he realised what had awoken him. "The front door!"
1252111111.title: His mum returns

"Hey Tom, I left my lun- what on earth?!" Tom's mother walked in as Tom was struggling to stand up and escape the playpen.

"What are you... are you wearing your sister's pullups?" She said, walking closer. "and you've USED them??" Tom blushed furiously, finally ceasing his escape of the playpen, trying to cover his crotch but continuing to suck on the pacifier still in his mouth, the sensation somehow managing to sooth him slightly.

"This is a lot to take in," she continued, " is this why you're not even TRYING to get a job? Are you that eager to shun responsibity that you pretend to be a baby all day?"

Completely overcome with embarrassment all that Tom can manage is "I..."

The Remote can Change Ages, and it has Several Settings.
The Channel Button allows Adjusting age in Years, the Volume is Months.
The Number Pad can be set to Years or Months.
The Remote can be set to work on a target or the holder.
It has a Safety that Prevents it from making Someone TOO Young, plus it has an Emergency Reverse button.
The Remote can be Set to Change Clothing(Currently Off) and can Change Clothing without someone Wearing it, either in Size or to be Age-Appropriate

info.brief_description: A Kid is Jealous of their new Younger Sibling. Regression and Maybe even Diapers Ensue.

Follow the Adventures of a Kid who's Jealous of their new Younger Sibling, and due to something they Regress.
Rules:

Older Kids/Teenagers should Physically Regress first, Otherwise you Must Explain how they can fit into Diapers(Such as being Small for their age etc.)
